regulations.title: Utah Social Media Regulation Act - Minor Protections
regulations.content: Social media companies must implement curfew restrictions for users under 18 in Utah, blocking access between 10:30 PM and 6:30 AM unless parental consent is provided. Companies must also implement age verification systems and parental approval for accounts.

regulations.title: NCMEC Mandatory Reporting Requirements
regulations.content: Electronic service providers must report known instances of child sexual abuse material (CSAM) to the National Center for Missing & Exploited Children within a reasonable time. Providers must implement detection systems and maintain evidence.

regulations.title: EU Digital Services Act - Platform Obligations
regulations.content: Very large online platforms must provide transparency reports, implement user flagging mechanisms, establish appeal processes for content moderation decisions, and conduct risk assessments for systemic risks.
regulations.penalties: Up to 6% of global annual turnover

regulations.title: General Data Protection Regulation
regulations.content: Processing personal data requires a lawful basis under Article 6. Data subjects have rights to access, portability, erasure, objection to processing, and rectification. Special protections apply to children's data.
regulations.penalties: Up to 4% of global annual turnover or â‚¬20M

regulations.title: Children's Online Privacy Protection Act
regulations.content: Websites directed to children under 13 must obtain verifiable parental consent before collecting personal information from children. Enhanced protections apply to known child users.

regulations.title: California Consumer Privacy Act
regulations.content: California residents have rights to know what personal information is collected, delete personal information, opt-out of sale, and non-discrimination for exercising privacy rights.

regulations.title: Australia Online Safety Act
regulations.content: Social media services must implement systems to detect and remove class 1 material, provide user reporting mechanisms, and maintain content standards appropriate for Australian users.

regulations.title: UK Age Appropriate Design Code
regulations.content: Online services likely to be accessed by children must implement privacy by design, data minimization, and default settings that prioritize children's privacy and wellbeing.
regulations.penalties: Up to 4% of global annual turnover
